message.body: Some are informational, others are classes. And then there's a trade show.
You kn
You know what, that's what I would think one would do at a convention. Minus the classes. What's that about? Hahah. That sound tough, you know, having to sit in class while you're in VEGAS!
Hahaha. Yeah, I'm learning about different things like how to hire a GM or revenue management. Got to hang out a bit tonight.
Good! As you should :) I'm happy you're not in bed at like 10 p.m. You can do that later...on the plane back!
What would you say are my best qualities?
I would say your caring, devoted and personable.
Thanks! I'm looking at commonly asked interview questions and that was one of them hahah. It's pretty funny to ask someone that though. Sounds braggy.
Lol, nah... That's fine. That's not really the one to worry about. The one to worry about is "what are your worse qualities?"
That's another odd one. They say you give one to three that you that are minor and say/give examples how you are improving on it.

Another way to twist that is to actually give a positive tone to it. So for example, you could say that you demand too much from your teammates. You always want to have your teammates meet deadlines or get things to you quicker. Some interviewers could actually see this as a positive, but you would still have to say you are working on it.
The nerves are beginning to set in. I feel unprepared. Ugh...so what's on the agenda for today?
I have trade show now for an hour. Then I have classes until 5. Closing reception tonight and then some packing to do. What's up for you the rest of the day?
After this, I have stuff to do for my mom and the house.
Wow that went by so fast.
Your trip is almost over!
I know.... It went so quick... That would happen.
Ahhh it's over.
Thanks god!
How'd it go?
*thank
I'm not sure. Okay, what does this mean to you?
She sounded really nice
At the end of the conversation, she said they want to move on with a Skills assessment that/exam, something along that line.
*teat
**test
It's nothing I could study for.
I can take it at my convenience
Try to take it as soon as possible.
Pretty much, they'll be in contact.
Especially if you can't study for it.
HOWEVER, she said she's going to talk to some other people on the team about out conversation.
*our
So did I so good is bad?
*do
*or
They want to move forward and have me take the assessment
That's a good thing. She wouldn't go through the trouble to say that if she wasn't going to.
But she is going to talk to other people about our conversation.
Movement forward is always s good step. Asking you to take the test means that they are interested.
I feel that that's almost a standard thing to do during the process. To just have everyone take it.
Not really. When I applied for an insurance company, they had me take a test, but they didn't ask my one friend to take it who applied for the same position.
Oh that makes me feel better, thanks! You wants to work in insurance?
Nah... I applied hoping to get more interview experience. Apparently I did well. Haha
Smart! Hahah that's a good idea.
Hey, wanna FaceTime and see my room? I know that you wanted to see it.
Uh yea!!!!
Hahah. Alright.
Hmmm. You try calling me. It says you're not available.
What??? Okay.
Hmmm. Weird... Keeps disconnecting.
Yea, it's not going through.
Let me try something.
It says my FaceTime is on in my settings.
What is up...
Not sure. I'll take shoot a video and send it to you.
Okay! Yay!!!
What the pho Steve?!
That is a niiiice room!
Wish I could've seen your reaction lol.
Hahahah "one tub". Are you expecting more?
Imagine that expression, but with my face ;)
Well that's too cute... Fits perfectly. Hahaha.
Sit on those couches!!!
Have to do it before you leave!
They look comfy!
Lol, if I get a chance to relax, I'll try to have a seat.
I had one at 11, and now I'm at lunch. Another is starting in 20 minutes.
Are you in class yet?

The first one was a revenue management class, so how to increase sales without reducing too much occupancy in the hotel. This one now is an owners panel about how to hire the right general manager for your properties.
What do they talk about in these classes?
There ya go!
Hahah I like the socks and bare legs look you got going there.
Lol, yeah gonna need these socks later anyways.
Heading back out?
Later tonight. Have the closing party.
Yeah. Everything is here.
Oh is it at your hotel?
How convenient. What is that picture on your walk of?
*wall
Not a clue. Lol.
It looks like someone just took a paint and poured two globs on a a piece of paper.
*paint jar
That's what I got from it.
So any plans for Halloween yet?
Nah... I thought my friend was having a party, but not sure yet.
Halloween was more exciting when I was younger.
